children.text: This token certificate has been cryptographically signed and verified on the STELS network using {self.raw.genesis.wallet_protocol.sign_alg} with {self.raw.genesis.wallet_protocol.hash_alg} hashing. All signatures comply with canonical DER encoding standards with lowS enforcement.
